title: 24 EXTRA LARGE RV SITES
description: All sites can accommodate a 40 foot RV with multiple slideouts and parking for two vehicles

title: FREE LAUNDROMAT
description: Laundromat is fully stocked with everything you need and free for customer use

title: 24/7 VIDEO SURVEILLANCE
description: The campground and laundromat building is continually monitered by several HD cameras.

title: HIGH-SPEED WIFI
description: One gigabyte high-speed Wi-Fi is broadcast on a 30 antenna mesh system. There is an antenna at every site for a full-bar connection.

title: FISHING PONDS
description: Two fishing ponds are kept stocked with fish and available for any camper.

title: VENDING / FREE ICE
description: Vending is offered in the laundromat building along with free ice for your RV.
